content:
@all,
I asked CISL to install Trello for Gmail, which enables populating Trello boards with cards using content from email.
Trello is a great tool. I think the app is useful as it makes maintaining a Trello "to do" list, for example, with tasks originating in email.

However, there's some push back from the management, who want to make this an "individual install" (i.e., only for me). 

Would you use this app? If yes, please respond with :+1:
